SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.config.server

Class ScenarioConfig

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.ConfigFoundation
com.mimecast.robin.config.server.ScenarioConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ScenarioConfig extends ConfigFoundation
Server scenario configuration container.

This is a container for scenarios defined in the server configuration.

One instance will be made for every scenario defined.

This can be used to define specific behaviours for the server.

As in when to reject a command and with what response.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getHelo

      public String getHelo()
      Gets HELO to match.

      This is used to select the scenario to run.

      Once the specific HELO is received the server will enact the matching scenario.

      Returns:
      HELO string.

    • getLhlo

      public String getLhlo()
      Gets LHLO to match.

      This is used to select the scenario to run.

      Once the specific LHLO is received the server will enact the matching scenario.

      Returns:
      LHLO string.

    • getEhlo

      public String getEhlo()
      Gets EHLO to match.

      This is used to select the scenario to run.

      Once the specific EHLO is received the server will enact the matching scenario.

      Returns:
      EHLO string.

    • getStarTls

      public BasicConfig getStarTls()
      Gets STARTTLS response.

      If none defined the server will 220.

      If response doesn't start with 2 it will not handshake.

      Returns:
      BasicConfig instance.

    • getMail

      public String getMail()
      Gets MAIL response.

      If none defined the server will 250.

      Returns:
      MAIL response string.

    • getRcpt

      public List<Map<String,String>> getRcpt()
      Gets RCPT list.

      Each entry is a map with a value key and a response key.

      Value represents the TO address to match.

      Response is obviously the response to give if value matched.

      If none defined the server will 250.

      Returns:
      RCPT list.

    • getData

      public String getData()
      Gets DATA response.

      If none defined the server will 250.

      Returns:
      DATA response string.
